original_text: The Israelites did not attack them, because of the promise that their leaders had made. They had made a strong promise in the name of the Lord God of Israel that they would not kill the Gibeonites.
korean_text: 그러나 회중 족장들이 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와로 그들에게 맹세했기 때문에 이스라엘 자손이 그들을 치지 못한지라 그러므로 회중이 다 족장들을 원망하니

sentences.original_text: The Israelites did not attack them
They had made a strong promise
in the name of the Lord God of Israel
that they would not kill the Gibeonites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 기브온 사람들을 죽이지 않을 것이라는
